prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (massive burly Pacific Islander warrior:1.3), long messy wild dark forest green hair, fierce battle-hardened expression, realistic sweat and grime, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (weathered skin texture:1.2), individual hair strands, source palette preservation, identical color matching, realistic muscle anatomy with sub-surface scattering, cinematic film grain, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, smooth skin, airbrushed, low quality, (bright neon green hair:1.4), perfect skin, clean
